excerpt: "So as a cancer surgeon how do I feel or where all in today’s scenario does AI play a role in diagnosis treatment, or research as far as cancer is concerned. If we try to divide AI in cancer it will be in four different categories – AI in cancer research, means facilitating early diagnosis or drug discoveries"
